title: EntityDispatcherBase
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

EntityDispatcherBaselink

Dispatches EntityCollection actions to their reducers and effects (default implementation). All save commands rely on an Ngrx Effect such as EntityEffects.persist$.

class EntityDispatcherBase<T> implements EntityDispatcher { constructor(entityName: string, entityActionFactory: EntityActionFactory, store: Store<EntityCache>, selectId: IdSelector<T> = defaultSelectId, defaultDispatcherOptions: EntityDispatcherDefaultOptions, reducedActions$: any, entityCacheSelector: MemoizedSelector<Object, EntityCache, DefaultProjectorFn<EntityCache>>, correlationIdGenerator: CorrelationIdGenerator) guard: EntityActionGuard<T> toUpdate: (entity: Partial<T>) => Update<T> entityName: string entityActionFactory: EntityActionFactory store: Store<EntityCache> selectId: IdSelector<T> createEntityAction<P = any>(entityOp: EntityOp, data?: P, options?: EntityActionOptions): EntityAction<P> createAndDispatch<P = any>(op: EntityOp, data?: P, options?: EntityActionOptions): EntityAction<P> dispatch(action: Action): Action add(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> cancel(correlationId: any, reason?: string, options?: EntityActionOptions): void delete(arg: string | number | T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<number | string> getAll(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> getByKey(key: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> getWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> load(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> update(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> upsert(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> addAllToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void addOneToCache(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void addManyToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void clearCache(options?: EntityActionOptions): void removeOneFromCache(arg: string | number | T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void removeManyFromCache(args: (string | number)[] | T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void updateOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void updateManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void upsertOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void upsertManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void setFilter(pattern: any): void setLoaded(isLoaded: boolean): void setLoading(isLoading: boolean): void }

Constructorlink

constructor(entityName: string, entityActionFactory: EntityActionFactory, store: Store<EntityCache>, selectId: IdSelector<T> = defaultSelectId, defaultDispatcherOptions: EntityDispatcherDefaultOptions, reducedActions$: any, entityCacheSelector: MemoizedSelector<Object, EntityCache, DefaultProjectorFn<EntityCache>>, correlationIdGenerator: CorrelationIdGenerator)

Parameters

entityName

Name of the entity type for which entities are dispatched
entityActionFactory

Creates an {EntityAction}
store

The store, scoped to the EntityCache
selectId

Returns the primary key (id) of this entity

Optional. Default is defaultSelectId.
defaultDispatcherOptions

Dispatcher options configure dispatcher behavior such as whether add is optimistic or pessimistic by default.
reducedActions$

Actions scanned by the store after it processed them with reducers.
entityCacheSelector

Store selector for the EntityCache
correlationIdGenerator

Generates correlation ids for query and save methods

Propertieslink

Property Description
guard: EntityActionGuard<T>

Utility class with methods to validate EntityAction payloads.
toUpdate: (entity: Partial<T>) => Update<T>

Convert an entity (or partial entity) into the Update<T> object update... and upsert... methods take Update<T> args
entityName: string

Name of the entity type for which entities are dispatched

Declared in constructor.
entityActionFactory: EntityActionFactory

Creates an {EntityAction}

Declared in constructor.
store: Store<EntityCache>

The store, scoped to the EntityCache

Declared in constructor.
selectId: IdSelector<T>

Returns the primary key (id) of this entity

Declared in constructor.

data

the action data

Optional. Default is undefined.
options

additional options

mode_edit code

Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type and dispatch it immediately to the store.

Parameters

op

{EntityOp} the entity operation
data

the action data

Optional. Default is undefined.

additional options

Dispatch an Action to the store.
dispatch(action: Action): Action

Parameters

the Action

Returns

Action: the dispatched Action

add() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save a new entity to remote storage.
add(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity

entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: A terminating Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

cancel() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to cancel the persistence operation (query or save). Will cause save observable to error with a PersistenceCancel error. Caller is responsible for undoing changes in cache from pending optimistic save
cancel(correlationId: any, reason?: string, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

correlationId

The correlation id for the corresponding EntityAction
reason

explains why canceled and by whom.

Optional. Default is undefined.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.

Parameters

entity

Type: T.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<number | string>: A terminating Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.

delete(key: string | number, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<number | string>

Parameters

key

The entity to delete
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<number | string>: A terminating Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

getAll() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and merge the queried entities into the cached collection.
getAll(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: A terminating Observable of the queried entities that are in the collection after server reports success query or the query error.

getByKey() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entity with this primary key. If the server returns an entity, merge it into the cached collection.
getByKey(key: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

key

Type: any.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: A terminating Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

getWithQuery() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and merge the results into the cached collection.
getWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

queryParams

the query in a form understood by the server
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: A terminating Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.

load() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
load(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: A terminating Observable of the entities in the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

update() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save the updated entity (or partial entity) in remote storage. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
update(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity

update entity, which might be a partial of T but must at least have its key.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: A terminating Observable of the updated entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

upsert() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save a new or existing entity to remote storage. Only dispatch this action if your server supports upsert.
upsert(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity

entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: A terminating Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

addAllToCache() link

mode_edit code

Replace all entities in the cached collection. Does not save to remote storage.

entities

Type: T[].
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

addOneToCache() link

mode_edit code

Add a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Ignored if an entity with the same primary key is already in cache.

Parameters

entity

Type: T.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

addManyToCache() link

mode_edit code

Add multiple new entities directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Entities with primary keys already in cache are ignored.

entities

Type: T[].
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

updateOneInCache() link

mode_edit code

Update a cached entity directly. Does not update that entity in remote storage. Ignored if an entity with matching primary key is not in cache. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
updateOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity

Type: Partial.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

updateManyInCache() link

mode_edit code

Update multiple cached entities directly. Does not update these entities in remote storage. Entities whose primary keys are not in cache are ignored. Update entities may be partial but must at least have their keys. such partial entities patch their cached counterparts.
updateManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities

Type: Partial[].
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

upsertOneInCache() link

mode_edit code

Add or update a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entity might be a partial of T but must at least have its key. Pass the Update structure as the payload
upsertOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity

Type: Partial.
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

mode_edit code

entities

Type: Partial[].
options

Type: EntityActionOptions.

Optional. Default is undefined.
